{{alias}}( key, value )
    Revives a JSON-serialized regular expression object.

    Parameters
    ----------
    key: string
        Key.

    value: any
        Value.

    Returns
    -------
    out: any
        Value or RegExp object.

    Examples
    --------
    > var str = '{"type":"RegExp","pattern":"ab+c","flags":""}';
    > var err = JSON.parse( str, {{alias}} )
    <RegExp>

    See Also
    --------
